attributes.action: Condemn Israel for its continuing disregard of Palestinian lives and property.
attributes.background: Israel has been annexing Palestinian land for years without any one country or government stopping them. This has gone on for long enough, we demand action to stop Israel from taking more homes and Palestinian lives.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same/a similar action: 

Condemn Israel for their treatment of Palestine and Palestinians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585309
